About Me

Marisa L. Cooper

I'm a born cook. I love cooking and trying out new tasty things to make. A few years ago, my friends and I all dreamed of creating a business together where we cook amazing food for our community. When deciding on a name for our dream business, we took the first two letter of our names and mashed them together; KaMoMaLoCa was born! When I first came to Japan to be with my wonderful husband, I quickly realized that getting a job here was not easy. After a few months of trying, my friends suggested I start a home business and they taught me how to make empanadas. From then on I took our dream business name and turned it into a reality!
